channel.title: The Tragic Wait - Video Tribute for Black Mesa: Source
channel.description:
Hello, Black Mesa: Source forums. I wish to share with you all a video someone (not me) made exploring what Black Mesa: Source means to me (not me). I realize it has little relevance to anyone else, but it was a cathartic experience finally coming to terms with the troubling troubles I held during these troubled times and I (I mean he) hope(s) it, too, can help someone else in its own little way:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iwtRY7ByfTg&hd=1']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iwtRY7ByfTg[/url]

item.title: The Tragic Wait - Video Tribute for Black Mesa: Source

amassing video, but still sad

item.title: The Tragic Wait - Video Tribute for Black Mesa: Source
item.dc:creator: Barphy_Mlack
item.description:
Thank you for the nominal words, my colleagues. But don’t be sad, for this is all within theoretical limits! After all, with our combined brains and brawn, we’re sure to make an excellent team, won’t we?
